texts.Wechat.OfficialAccount:-1: The system is busy, at this point please ask the developer to try again later.
texts.Wechat.OfficialAccount:40001: AppSecret is wrong or AppSecret doesn't belong to this public number, please ask the developer to confirm the correctness of the AppSecret
texts.Wechat.OfficialAccount:40002: Please make sure the grant_type field value is client_credential
texts.Wechat.OfficialAccount:40164: The IP address of the calling interface is not in the whitelist, please set it in the interface IP whitelist.
texts.Wechat.OfficialAccount:89503: This IP call requires administrator confirmation, please contact the administrator
texts.Wechat.OfficialAccount:89501: This IP is waiting for administrator confirmation, please contact administrator
texts.Wechat.OfficialAccount:89506: This IP has been denied by the administrator twice in 24 hours, you cannot use this IP to call again in 24 hours
texts.Wechat.OfficialAccount:89507: This IP has been denied by the administrator once in 1 hour, and you may not use this IP to call again in 1 hour.
texts.WechatOfficialAccountAppId: Wechat Official Account Development App Id
texts.WechatOfficialAccountSecret: Wechat Official Account Development App Key
